actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that proposed changes in postal rates and classes shall not be effective unless approved by Congress.

summary.text: Provides that proposed changes in postal rates and classes shall not be effective unless approved by Congress, within ninety days after their submission to the Congress. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3629).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that proposed changes in postal rates and classes shall not be effective unless approved by Congress.
